query:
SELECT 
  expenseType,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  SUM(amount) as total,
  AVG(amount) as average,
  MAX(amount) as highest,
  MIN(amount) as lowest
FROM expenses
GROUP BY expenseType
ORDER BY total DESC;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kNF22PapS9mysw.root --database WZQk4bD8DnsRHwYBkmh7FN --execute 
SELECT 
  expenseType,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  SUM(amount) as total,
  AVG(amount) as average,
  MAX(amount) as highest,
  MIN(amount) as lowest
FROM expenses
GROUP BY expenseType
ORDER BY total DESC;
